text: Oleksiy "Alexei" Strakhov (born October 16, 1975) is an ice hockey player from Kharkiv, Ukraine, currently playing for HC Dinamo Minsk of the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL), and for the Belarusian national team. ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:Belarusian ice hockey right wingers Category:Expatriate ice hockey players in Russia Category:Amur Khabarovsk players Category:HC Dinamo Minsk players Category:Khimik-SKA Novopolotsk players Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian ice hockey right wingers
title: Alexei Strakhov
